subject: style: premium visual redesign with gradients and glassmorphism
body:
- Add gradient message bubbles with primary blue gradient and glow effects
- Implement glassmorphism header and compose bar with backdrop blur
- Enhance chat list cards with premium shadows and avatar ring effects
- Add premium send button with gradient background
- Update ChatBackground with subtle gradient vignette and dot pattern
- Add new theme colors for glass effects (glass, glassBorder, glassHighlight)
- Darken background colors for more premium OLED feel
- Update typography with better letter spacing in headers
title: premium visual redesign with gradients and glassmorphism
